main_characters.name: Rodney Copperbottom
main_characters.notes: Idealistic young inventor robot who dreams of working for Bigweld

main_characters.name: Fender Pinwheeler
main_characters.notes: Mischievous red robot constantly falling apart; Rodney's best friend

main_characters.name: Cappy
main_characters.notes: Employee at Bigweld Industries who helps Rodney

main_characters.name: Bigweld
main_characters.notes: Legendary inventor and founder of Bigweld Industries; Rodney's idol

villains.name: Phineas T. Ratchet
villains.notes: New CEO of Bigweld Industries; wants to discontinue spare parts

villains.name: Madame Gasket
villains.notes: Ratchet's evil mother who runs the Chop Shop

rusties.name: Piper Pinwheeler
rusties.notes: Fender's younger sister; has a crush on Rodney

rusties.name: Aunt Fanny
rusties.notes: Large robot who takes in outmodes; known for her oversized rear

rusties.name: Lug
rusties.notes: Large green muscular robot, friends with Diesel

rusties.name: Diesel
rusties.notes: Slim, mute robot who lacks a voice box; Lug's friend

family_and_others.name: Herb Copperbottom
family_and_others.notes: Rodney's father; works as a dishwasher

family_and_others.name: Loretta Geargrinder
family_and_others.notes: Receptionist at Bigweld Industries; Fender's love interest

family_and_others.name: Mr. Gunk
family_and_others.notes: Herb's cynical boss at the restaurant

family_and_others.name: Wonderbot
family_and_others.notes: Small flying robot invented by Rodney

role_definitions.antagonist: Opposes heroes but may not be evil
